text: Álvaro Dias (born December 7, 1944) is a Brazilian politician. He has represented Paraná in the Federal Senate since 1999. He was the governor of Paraná. He is a member of Podemos. He was born in Quatá, São Paulo. Dias is a member of PODE and is the party's presidential candidate in the 2018 election. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paraná State
title: Álvaro Dias
